Hello, I'm having trouble with ads
Hi Thiago! I'm here to help with your ad issues. Could you please provide more details about the trouble you're experiencing with your ads? This way, I can assist you better.

is giving this message

Your payment information is missing. To launch your ads, please update your billing details with a valid credit card and resubmit your ads for review.

It looks like you need to update your billing details with a valid credit card to launch your ads. Please make sure you have a valid payment method associated with your account, even if you're using ad credits. Once you've updated the payment information, don't forget to resubmit your ads for review. If you need more guidance, feel free to check out this article: [How to create your first ad](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17618196971149-How-to-create-your-first-ad).
